alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 21 at 9:51AM PST until November 21 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph. Isolated gusts up to 65 mph through noon. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys, Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty east winds will continue for tonight into early Wednesday, but not be as strong nor widespread.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
